jump_scares.spoiler: The handcuffed patient lunges forward in the bed
A dog jumps at the car window and barks
Jack jumps at Bess to scare her
Amber suddenly slips into the hole and screams
A tree branch suddenly flies through the window and breaks it after Jack says “That’s why I come on when you least expect it.
After Paul says “I think there’s something in here” an animal jumps at him
Hank jumps at Abby from the side
After Hank says “you should get that thing off him before he floats away” there is a car horn blast and a cut to Hank firing a gun
As Abby is pulling the hammock there is a cut to Hank falling out of bed
The trap Hank set suddenly goes off
As Hank’s gunshot lights up the area the monster is seen kneeling on the ground
While Hank is singing, the monster suddenly lunges at him
David is knocked down by a werewolf which then begins to attack Jack
The werewolf attacks David
During a dream sequence, a naked David jumps on a deer and begins eating it
During another dream sequence, Jack suddenly opens his eyes and growls at Nurse Alex
A man opens the front door and is gunned down by some strange looking mutants
Nurse Alex opens the curtains and is attacked by a mutant
David adjusts the bathroom mirror and sees un-dead Jack in the reflection
A werewolf jumps out and attacks a young couple
The scene abruptly cuts to a telephone ringing
There is a close up of the werewolf’s face and a loud growling noise before the scene cuts to a train
The scene abruptly cuts to a lion roaring at a zoo
A man is attacked by a werewolf in the movie theater
The werewolf bursts through the door to the movie theater
The werewolf roars and is repeatedly shot
Chris looks behind a curtain and a werewolf lunges at him
A werewolf appears out of the darkness and attacks Brad
As Serafine removes her top, Andy briefly has a vision of her as a werewolf
Andy sees the disfigured ghost of Serafine’s mother
Andy sees Brad’s head on a plate of food
Andy, now transformed into a werewolf, jumps out of the fountain and attacks Amy
Andy’s shadow appears on the wall behind Amy
An apparently dead Amy suddenly opens her eyes and talks to Andy
A transformed werewolf suddenly jumps out from underneath some robes
A werewolf attacks two of the police
A werewolf jumps through a train window, shortly after the werewolf bursts into the passengers section of the train

The alien suddenly attacks one of the policemen as he closes the van doors, a few seconds later it pounces on the other policeman
The alien appears by the door to the van
The alien lunges at the windscreen
The alien attacks Hi Hatz’ henchman as he turns around
There is a loud bang on the door

The alien bangs on the lift

Behind Melanie a man suddenly jumps out of the water and pulls her in

A park guest’s face shifts into a creepy smile accompanied by a sound cue as she walks past the camera

movies.title: Stay Out Of The F**king Attic

jump_scares.spoiler: A hand hits the floor and a scream is heard
As they open the door a box falls down

Lizzie puts her hand on Kyle’s shoulder while he is watching TV

A hand reaches out from underneath a car to grab a woman
A man’s face is suddenly engulfed in flames
A lady walks into another woman dressed in a Halloween costume
A lady leans back on the sofa to reveal Mary Bailey is sitting beside her

Bobbie turns around to face Jack and her face morphs into the red witch
The killer bursts through the window
The previously dead girl suddenly sits up and screams
The girl bursts through the door
The “child” jumps out at one of the kidnappers

The camera slowly zooms in on a silhouette on the window, and then quickly cuts to the dead guest’s disfigured face

movies.title: The House with a Clock in Its Walls

jump_scares.spoiler: A demon head pops out of the clock beside Lewis

During a flashback, Isaac grabs Jonathan’s throat after Jonathan checks him for a pulse
Some manure suddenly lands on Lewis
Birds fly out of the secret entrance as Jonathan crawls inside

Max turns around revealing he is a vampire

movies.title: The Return of the Living Dead

jump_scares.spoiler: While a person is contacting the police on the phone, a zombie jumps through the window
As the speaking character turns around to face the camera, they are unexpectedly shot in the chest in the middle of a calm monologue with no warning
As a character slowly backs into a large window behind them, a giant fleshy tentacle suddenly slams against it from the other side

While a character screams a triumphant phrase, a giant tentacle suddenly falls on them with a loud thud and squishes them, halting the uplifting music score and instantly shifting the tone of the scene
With very little warning, Leatherface comes out of the record vault after Choptop points it out
Leatherface crashes through the door behind LG
Leatherface breaks through the wall behind Stretch
Sudden chainsaw noises up ahead startle Stretch
Leatherface bursts out of the tunnel in front of Stretch
